item.title: In Trump’s Shadow, Greenland Votes for a New Government
item.description: President Trump has expressed a desire to “get” Greenland, but the victorious party is in no rush to change the status quo.

item.title: Republican Refers to Sarah McBride, Transgender Congress Member, as a Man
item.description: Representative Keith Self of Texas insisted on calling Representative Sarah McBride, the first openly transgender member of Congress, “Mr. McBride,” a...

item.title: Europe Retaliates Against Trump’s Tariffs as Trade Fight Widens
item.description: The European Union responded to American steel and aluminum tariffs with its own tariffs on boats and bourbon — and pledges of more to come.

item.title: German Arms Maker Rheinmetall Has Record Sales in ‘Era of Rearmament’
item.description: Since the start of the war in Ukraine, the company moved quickly to meet Europe’s growing need for military spending.
